description.narrative: - Contribute to addressing power shortage: The Project is expected to support the construction of around 50 MW of solar projects. - Development of the Egyptian Renewable Energy Sector: The Project is expected to help play a catalytic role in starting solar power development in the country. - Employment: The Project will help generate direct and indirect employment opportunities during construction and operation. - Climate Change: The Project will help avoid GHG emissions and thus contribute to addressing global climate change concerns.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

title.narrative: Summary of Investment Information - Anticipated Impact Measurement & Monitoring (AIMM) Assessment and Main Environmental & Social Risks and Impacts of the Project
